caption: Whoa! What the hell are you doing here?

responces.caption: Dirty Witch! What kind of magic do you use? I need to know it all!
– I'm traveling in thirst of knowledge. I'd heared you are the last rune caster. This sacred skill is my goal.

caption: – This kind of magic is demanding. Let's see if you have the aptitude.

First you need to learn appearance of mysterious runes. Only capable one can learn it. Look!
'r', 'i', 'a', 'f', 'n', 'p', 'e'

responces.caption: – What a strange combinaton of lines and spots? Who or WHAT can invent this!.. Wicked creatures... Let me redraw this and i'll come back when i'll ready.
– I didnt sleep all this years to learn sick symbols. But I'm done!

caption: – Well, well... Take this set of runic cards. Try to cast your first spell: FIRE
